Thanks for this... I'm still seeding (at 50% so far).

Great quality, except for S01E05 - His and Hers. This file is only 53.8mb and only runs for about 6 minutes.  It has been truncated.

What I have done, is grab S01E04 - His and Hers from this torrent: https://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5528875/Are_You_Being_Served_Series_01#filelistContainer  (the episode numbering is different).

There are only a few seeders of this torrent, including me, and I only have this episode. It is about 40mb larger at 321mb, but is about the same quality.  This makes the collection complete.

Thanks again.

The Pilot episode is bad, in addition to "His and Hers". I've uploaded a torrent with the correct files as well as the 2010 color version of the Pilot here:

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6616130

Excellent! Thanks to purplebic for the initial torrent, and to Jona198102 for the corrected Pilot and S01E05!

I got introduced to the series by my ex-wife, and I still love it. I'd never been able to watch all the episodes until now. I'll be seeding it as much as I can.
